headline: How Visa’s AI Commerce Tie-Up With Fiserv Will Impact Visa (V) Investors
summary: In December 2025, Fiserv announced a collaboration with Visa to roll out Visa Intelligent Commerce and the Trusted Agent Protocol across Fiserv’s merchant ecosystem, aiming to secure and authenticate AI-driven “agentic” transactions. This partnership could make Visa a core infrastructure provider for automated, AI-led shopping experiences by tying its authentication and tokenization services directly into a large, existing merchant network. Next, we’ll examine how Visa’s Trusted Agent...
